#summary Some benchmarking results
#labels Notes,Development

= Introduction =

The goal here is to track the evolution of the performance of the RDKit over time.

The test data and scripts will be in svn.

= Details =

  # Results1: construct 1000 molecules from smiles
  # Results2: construct 1000 molecules from sdf
  # Results3: construct 1823 fragment molecules from SMARTS (smiles really)
  # Results4: 1000 x 100 HasSubstructMatch (100 from Results3)
  # Results5: 1000 x 100 GetSubstructMatches (100 from Results3)
  # Results6: construct 428 queries from RLewis_smarts.txt
  # Results7: 1000 x 428 HasSubstructMatch
  # Results8: 1000 x 428 GetSubstructMatches
